chemoreception.notes: Sea urchins generally possess chemoreceptors for detecting chemical cues in their environment. Inferred for Toxopneustidae, given their marine habitat.

mechanoreception.notes: Sea urchins use mechanoreceptors to sense touch and vibrations. Inferred for Toxopneustidae, given their body structure and benthic lifestyle.
